name: Modmail
description: An easy to install Modmail bot for Discord - DM to contact mods!

GUILD_ID.description: The id for the server you are hosting this bot for.

OWNERS.description: Comma separated user IDs of people that are allowed to use owner only commands. (eval).

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection URI for self-hosting your data.

LOG_URL.description: The url of the log viewer app for viewing self-hosted logs.
